tool.name: Get Beta values from RGset
tool.description: Read in RGset and produce matrix of Beta values
tool.help:
What it does
A ‘MethylSet’ stores ‘meth’ and ‘Unmeth’. From these it is easy to compute Beta values, defined as
Beta = Meth / (Meth + Unmeth + offset)
Extract beta values from RGset of the IDAT files.
